com.github.daytron.revworks.model.ClassTable

  • Packages that use ClassTable 
    Package Description
    com.github.daytron.revworks.event
    Provides classes for custom events and Guava's EventBus.
    com.github.daytron.revworks.model
    Provides classes that represent tables in the database.
    com.github.daytron.revworks.service
    Provides classes for data services for insertions, updates and retrievals of data from the database for students and lecturers.
